original_text: And your border shall turn from the south to the ascent of Akrabbim, and pass on to Zin: and the going forth thereof shall be from the south to Kadeshbarnea, and shall go on to Hazaraddar, and pass on to Azmon:
korean_text: 돌아서 아그랍빔 언덕 남쪽에 이르고 신을 지나 가데스바네아 남쪽에 이르고 또 하살아달을 지나 아스몬에 이르고

sentences.original_text: And your border shall turn from the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너의 경계는 남쪽으로부터 돌 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the going forth thereof shall be from the south
and shall go on to Hazaraddar,
